response.original_title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
response.overview: Cars fly, trees fight back, and a mysterious house-elf comes to warn Harry Potter at the start of his second year at Hogwarts. Adventure and danger await when bloody writing on a wall announces: The Chamber Of Secrets Has Been Opened. To save Hogwarts will require all of Harry, Ron and Hermione’s magical abilities and courage.
response.tagline: Something evil has returned to Hogwarts!
response.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
